diff_hunk:
@@ -141,21 +143,84 @@ darwin_cmake_vars = {
     "HAVE_MALLOC_MALLOC_H": 1,
 }
 
+# CMake variables specific to the Windows platform.
+win32_cmake_vars = {
+    # Headers
+    "HAVE_ERRNO_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_EXECINFO_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_FCNTL_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_FENV_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_INTTYPES_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_MALLOC_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_SIGNAL_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_STDINT_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_SYS_STAT_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H": 1,
+    "HAVE_ZLIB_H": 1,
+
+    # Features
+    "BACKTRACE_HEADER": "execinfo.h",
+    "HAVE_GETCWD": 1,
+    "HAVE_INT64_T": 1,
+    "HAVE_STRERROR": 1,
+    "HAVE_STRTOLL": 1,
+    "HAVE_SYSCONF": 1,
+    "HAVE_UINT64_T": 1,
+    "HAVE__CHSIZE_S": 1,
+    "HAVE___CHKSTK": 1,
+
+    # MSVC specific
+    "stricmp": "_stricmp",
+    "strdup": "_strdup",
+
+    # LLVM features
+    "ENABLE_BACKTRACES": 1,
+    "LLVM_BINDIR": "/dev/null",
+    "LLVM_DISABLE_ABI_BREAKING_CHECKS_ENFORCING": 0,
+    "LLVM_ENABLE_ABI_BREAKING_CHECKS": 0,
+    "LLVM_ENABLE_THREADS": 1,
+    "LLVM_ENABLE_ZLIB": 1,
+    "LLVM_HAS_ATOMICS": 1,
+    "LLVM_INCLUDEDIR": "/dev/null",
+    "LLVM_INFODIR": "/dev/null",
+    "LLVM_MANDIR": "/dev/null",
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_TARGET": 1,
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_TARGETINFO": 1,
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_TARGETMC": 1,
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_ASMPRINTER": 1,
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_ASMPARSER": 1,
+    "LLVM_NATIVE_DISASSEMBLER": 1,
+    "LLVM_ON_WIN32": 1,
+    "LLVM_PREFIX": "/dev/null",
+    "LLVM_VERSION_MAJOR": 0,
+    "LLVM_VERSION_MINOR": 0,
+    "LLVM_VERSION_PATCH": 0,
+    "LTDL_SHLIB_EXT": ".dll",
+    "PACKAGE_NAME": "llvm",
+    "PACKAGE_STRING": "llvm tensorflow-trunk",
+    "PACKAGE_VERSION": "tensorflow-trunk",
+    "RETSIGTYPE": "void",
+}
+
 # Select a set of CMake variables based on the platform.
 # TODO(phawkins): use a better method to select the right host triple, rather
 # than hardcoding x86_64.
 all_cmake_vars = select({
     "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow:darwin": cmake_var_string(
-        cmake_vars + llvm_target_cmake_vars("X86", "x86_64-apple-darwin") +
+        posix_cmake_vars + llvm_target_cmake_vars("X86", "x86_64-apple-darwin") +
         darwin_cmake_vars,
     ),
     "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow:linux_ppc64le": cmake_var_string(
-        cmake_vars +
+        posix_cmake_vars +
         llvm_target_cmake_vars("PowerPC", "powerpc64le-unknown-linux_gnu") +
         linux_cmake_vars,
     ),
+    "@org_tensorflow//tensorflow:windows": cmake_var_string(
+        win32_cmake_vars +
body: Done. I only refactor out "LLVM features" part seems there are sufficiently similar, but I do like to keep "Headers" and "Features" separated.
